DOC.brief_summary: To compare pharmacokinetic characteristic HCP1201 tablet 500/10 mg co-administration metformin 500 mg plus rosuvastatin 10 mg fast fed state , respectively .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison PK After Administration HCP1201 Co-administration Metformin SR 500mg Rosuvastatin 10mg
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-label , Randomized , Single-dose Crossover Study Compare Pharmacokinetics After Administration HCP1201 Tablet 500/10 mg Coadministration Metformin SR 500 mg Rosuvastatin 10 mg Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer , age 20~55 year The result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 19 kg/m2 , 27 kg/m2 Subject ability comprehend study objective , content property study drug participate trial .
